refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads data from MicroDAQ user disk

refsynopsisdiv.title: Description
refsynopsisdiv.para: This function reads data from file created with MicroDAQ 'To File' block. In order to read data from MicroDAQ device user has to provide file name (same as in 'To file' block).
refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: data = mdaq_get_file_data(name, type); data = mdaq_get_file_data(name, type, rows, cols);

listitem.para: file: File name created with 'To File' block
type: type of file ( 1 - text | 2 - binary )
rows: number of rows to read (optional for text filetype)
rows: number of columns to read (optional for text filetype)
